Description: JOB OBJECTIVE: To provide co-ordination and administrative support for the planning, tendering, and contracting processes to ensure the smooth operations of the Contracts Section function at Company and subsidiaries.Skills
Skills: At least 8 years’ experience as SR. Refueling Operator or 5 years supervisory level in oil and Gas sector.
Minimum Qualification- Graduate in any discipline
• Excellent knowledge of computer softwares (Word, Excel, Powerpoint etc)
